name: Dodge (itch) (plankp)
description:
Dodge

Drag and dodge, not Drag and drop!

Game Instructions
  • Drag your mouse to move the square.
  • Once the game starts, dodge everything!
  • Game will start once you move the square.

Taken directly from the game...

Note: If you happen to have a touchscreen, there is a chance that this game will work!
(iPad with Firefox works)
